articles.description: Adani Airport Holdings, a wholly owned subsidiary of Adani Enterprises, has acquired 23.5 percent stake in Mumbai International Airport from ACSA Global and Bid Services Division (Mauritius) for Rs 1,685.25 crore, the company said.
articles.content:

articles.title: M&M stock jumps 9% as Q3 beats expectations; here's what Goldman Sachs, Nomura said post result - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: The auto major reported a massive 39.6 percent YoY growth in profit to Rs 530 crore for the quarter ended December 2020. Revenue from operations grew by 16 percent YoY to Rs 14,056.5 crore in Q3 FY21 with strong tractor volumes.
